summary: Adds Land Dreughs, Mounts, Followers and Incubated Eggs
descriptionHtml:
Adds Land Dreughs, Mounts, Followers and Incubated Eggs (DLCs Dawnguard - Dragonborn required)

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/kAdsGNV.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000] MOUNTS (3)[/color][/b]


You have 1 mount, just near [u]the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)[/u]; and 1 Duo of summonable mounts …


To have the Duo of SUMMONABLE Mounts, you must buy the “Spell tome: Two Land Dreughs”, at [color=#00ff00][b]Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach[/b][/color]/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the book, you have the spell (Duration of the summon: 1 hour) ...

You can easily DISMISS when you want ! with an other "Spell tome: Dismiss Summoned Land Dreughs "

In order to buy the 2 books at Farengar, [b][i]you must place this mod at the bottom of the list when you launch the game[/i][/b]

If problem with the mount you can try a fast travel



[b][color=#ff0000] COMPANION [/color][/b] Near the mount, just near [u]the Western Watchtower (Whiterun)[/u]


You can talk: Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss, with the Land Dreugh (voice : Female Argonian!)

You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel



[b][color=#ff0000] INCUBATED EGGS[/color][/b] (Army of Land Dreughs)


This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs of Land Dreughs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create an army of Land Dreughs (5, 15 ... MORE ?...[color=#ff0000][i] [b] ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer[/b][/i][/color] ) that are following you as if you were their mother !

To obtain these Land Dreughs eggs, simply bring any “ Land Dreugh Egg ” (found with some Merchants in Whiterun : [color=#00ff00][i][b]Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare [/b][/i][/color]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Land Dreugh Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Land Dreughs.

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

In order to find the eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game



[b][color=#ff0000] CREDITS[/color][/b]


Mihail Romanov for the Land Dreughs in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84681/?] Land Dreughs- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- oblivion- eso) [/url]
author: gg77
